description:
Tri-Stars mobile suit team intercepts and destroys Kirks, who raised Loni like a father. Filled with rage and sorrow, Loni continues her massacre. The wishes of the dead Kirks bring her back to her senses, but the fury of the Zeon remnants makes the Shamblo run wild again, until Riddhe uses the Unicorn Gundam`s beam magnum to destroy it. Stunned by Loni`s death, Banagher is now confronted by the approach of a black Unicorn Gundam.
Source: crunchyroll
